content.arrabic: ذَهَبَ الظّـَمَأُ وَابْتَلّـَتِ الْعُرُوقُ، وَثَبَتَ الْأَجْرُ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
content.latin: Dzahabazh zhoma'u wabtallatil 'uruqu wa tsabatal ajru insya Allah.

translation.id: Telah hilanglah dahaga, telah basahlah kerongkongan, semoga ada pahala yang ditetapkan, jika Allah menghendaki.
translation.en: The thirst is gone, the throat is moistened, and may the reward be established, if Allah wills.
